title: Xorst
author: Xorst
content: Hey guys,I'm a broker for a businessman who's looking to purchase $40M worth of either USDT or BTC and it's start cause there's another one in need of a large scale too.Terms:- Deal will be done in Dubai.- Money can be transferred through a bank or cash in person in a public place but either way we will meetup and settle the deal up.- A discount on the amount is a must.- There's a commission for me from both sides the seller & the buyer, also willing to share commission to a broker but he must be the direct one of the seller.* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.- I have listed our terms but they are flexible according to the seller's terms, waiting to hear from you guys.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PM$40Mcash in person in a public placeLol. You know that weighs about 400 kg in $100 bills, right?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on December 07, 2022, 02:34:43 PMQuote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PM$40Mcash in person in a public placeLol. You know that weighs about 400 kg in $100 bills, right?We're talking about $40 million dollars here, and you're concerned about the rental fee for a forklift?  Besides, think about how much cocaine you can clean off of all those bills, that's got to be worth a few hundred thousand more.  Kinda like buying a used car and finding the ashtray full of coins.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PMHey guys,I'm a broker for a businessman who's looking to purchase $40M worth of either USDT or BTC and it's start cause there's another one in need of a large scale too.Terms:- Deal will be done in Dubai.- Money can be transferred through a bank or cash in person in a public place but either way we will meetup and settle the deal up.- A discount on the amount is a must.- There's a commission for me from both sides the seller & the buyer, also willing to share commission to a broker but he must be the direct one of the seller.* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.- I have listed our terms but they are flexible according to the seller's terms, waiting to hear from you guys.It's funny how "buyers" put conditions when it's a SELLER'S market or they think it's a one way street. 99% of the time when buyer put conditions to the seller is a red flag and at the end it is understood that this potential "buyer" is actually a scammer/fisherman. We will be glad to assist and fulfill buyer's request, once we verify buyer's CIS and validate the funds, if the client is REAL and RWA we will get him a comprehensive program, bulk coins at discount etc.Contact us for further discussion - bitcointalk or directly through our website www.cryptorolla.com Kind regards,CryptoRolla team

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PM* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.Try to transfer 5M dollars to your bank account in the UAE? Most likely, the account will be frozen and you will be contacted to verify the source of the funds, let alone about 40M. It is a sufficient crime to imprison you for about ten years if the second party is unknown (and if you can prove that you are trying to sell bitcoin)As for cash, it is absurd to be discussed in a public place.In general, can a person with 40M ask in an anonymous forum on the Internet? What accounts create such topics?

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PMI'm a broker for a businessman who's looking to purchase $40M worth of either USDT or BTC and it's start cause there's another one in need of a large scale too.Lol, i never thought that billionaires need to advertise on bitcointalk in order to get the deal done. Are OTC markets closed  Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PMTerms:- Deal will be done in Dubai.- Money can be transferred through a bank or cash in person in a public place but either way we will meetup and settle the deal up.- A discount on the amount is a must.- There's a commission for me from both sides the seller & the buyer, also willing to share commission to a broker but he must be the direct one of the seller.* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.Yeah, you are too much serious in conducting this deal but your terms do not look serious at all.By the way can we have proof that you have $40M with you and are they in the bank ?

comments.author: fennic
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PMHey guys,I'm a broker for a businessman who's looking to purchase $40M worth of either USDT or BTC and it's start cause there's another one in need of a large scale too.Terms:- Deal will be done in Dubai.- Money can be transferred through a bank or cash in person in a public place but either way we will meetup and settle the deal up.- A discount on the amount is a must.- There's a commission for me from both sides the seller & the buyer, also willing to share commission to a broker but he must be the direct one of the seller.* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.- I have listed our terms but they are flexible according to the seller's terms, waiting to hear from you guys.Brother your terms are so much serious and it looks a lie. If you want to buy such heavy amount than use Peer to peer trading in Biggest exchanges like1. Binance2. Kucoin3. Houbi.pro4. MEXCIn this way this large amount could get exposure and also a lot of Scammers can turn to you and also law enforcement. Cause they can ask what are you doing with so much money and how you got it.

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Quote from: Xorst on December 06, 2022, 01:19:35 PMHey guys,I'm a broker for a businessman who's looking to purchase $40M worth of either USDT or BTC and it's start cause there's another one in need of a large scale too.Terms:- Deal will be done in Dubai.- Money can be transferred through a bank or cash in person in a public place but either way we will meetup and settle the deal up.- A discount on the amount is a must.- There's a commission for me from both sides the seller & the buyer, also willing to share commission to a broker but he must be the direct one of the seller.* This is too serious and will be done asap if you are legit and looking for a smooth liquidation.- I have listed our terms but they are flexible according to the seller's terms, waiting to hear from you guys.Your story seems very strange to me.  Because I don't think to meet face to face with such a big wealth.  Here's how you'll meet the seller with $40 million.  It can be a crime.If the Story is true: Story is true then of course you can use this step.  You can trade via P2P by visiting Binance Exchange.  Your identity will not be leaked and you will be safe.Binance:
